name: magician

effect.sun_moon: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.

short_effect: Steals the target's held item when the bearer uses a damaging move.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
